entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches developing after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
